[Address Book] Can browse the address book
[Address Book] Can modify email address contacts
[Address Book] Can broadcast compose email to address lists
[Address Book] Can export email address lists to CSV/XML
[Address Book] Can export organization lists to CSV/XML
[Display Ticket] Can forward tickets to third-party email addresses
[Display Ticket] Can add sticky notes to tickets
[Display Ticket] Can permanently delete messages on tickets
[Mail] Can delete drafts owned by other workers
[RSS] Can export lists as RSS feeds
[Tasks] Can export task lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can assign tickets to other workers
[Tickets] Can broadcast reply to ticket lists
[Tickets] Can bulk update tickets in lists
[Tickets] Can export ticket lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can use the pile sorter on lists
[Watchers] Can add other workers as watchers
[Watchers] Can remove other workers as watchers

(optional, friendly URLs for Apache Web Server users)

Place the index.php file in a new directory on the appropriate public website. This directory can be named anything but will usually describe the portal. For example: http://www.cerberusweb.com/support/
